name: Dave Klein
biography: Dave is a consultant helping organizations of all sizes to develop applications more quickly (and have more fun doing it) with Groovy and Grails.  Dave has been involved in enterprise software development for the past 15 years. He has worked as a developer, architect, project manager, mentor and trainer. Dave has presented at user groups and national conferences. He is also the founder of the Capital Java User Group in Madison, Wisconsin, the Gateway Groovy Users in St. Louis, MO, and the author of Grails: A Quick-Start Guide.
